Welcome! This App serves as a guideline to see the basic design of Privacy Friendly Apps. Here introduce your app in one or two sentences.
Key Elements Introduce key elements of your app. Do not introduce too many details.
Github and Guide The sourcecode of this app is available at GitHub. For further explanations have a look at the Privacy Friendly App Guide.

Back Forward Bookmark
Help Share About Settings Add interest Add Event Home Log out Generate data Tutorial Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer

key_radius Notification Radius Choose radius discance to notify
My Videos Auto upload Upload the videos when wifi is available Upload Quality Specify video quality for uploads Notifications Choose notification sound About POI is an application that allow creating and displaying events that are in a chosen area by GPS. A user that will be interested in a certain event will get into the system and will appear to him some several options such as open a new event or searching for an exciting one by time and place. POI will learn about the user day routine and interest in events so it could offer him events that are related to his interest.
